commit.message:
Refine protocol between regulator and control threads

Stop using gc id to "hold down" regulator request. Control thread now has a "gc mode". Regulator requests are only made when control thread is in certain modes (idle, marking old).

Do not provide old mark queue when purging old satb buffers

This may cause young pointers to be marked and queued, and then cleared from the queue resulting in an incomplete transitive closure.
Include generation name in heuristic trigger log message
